attributes.action: Reduce Air Passenger Duty to Previous Levels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Help scrap the unfair, un-environmentally friendly air passenger duty which will do nothing to curb emissions, stop poorer families and individuals from flying and cripple an industry which employs 100s of 1000s of people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
